data.title: AI Resume Analyzer
data.content: Built an AI tool that checks how well a resume matches a job description. Achieved 91% accuracy using Scikit-learn and logistic regression.

data.title: Self-Supervised Learning for Autonomous Vehicle
data.content: Created a CNN model to predict vehicle steering angles from Indian road video datasets. Improved lane detection by 18% in simulation tests.

data.title: Personalized Travel Planning System
data.content: Designed a smart travel planner using deep learning. Recommended destinations based on user preferences with 93% match accuracy.
